title: Oatmeal bars recipe
directions: . Preheat the oven to 350ºF. Line an 8-inch square baking pan with baking paper.
Put one cup of the oats into a food processor and process to a flour.

In a large bowl, mix together the banana, vanilla extract, egg, milk, and oil until well combined. Stir in the oat flour and the remaining oats, cinnamon and baking powder, before folding in the berries.
Pour the batter into the prepared tin and bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until the edges are golden and the mixture is set. Remove from the oven and let cool in the tin before slicing into 12 bars.
Store the remaining bars in the refrigerator and consume within one week. Alternatively, wrap each bar individually and freeze, then defrost overnight as needed.
